item.title: Singtel provides an explanation of mobile performance
item.description:
Singtel contributed to the Infocomm Development Authority’s (IDA) MyConnection SG study, highlighting connectivity, speed, and coverage as crucial aspects of user experience. Singtel emphasized that, based on study feedback, users prioritize network coverage, call stability, customer service, and reliable data connections over pure speed. Consistent speed across a broad coverage area is key for a positive user experience. This feedback helps Singtel pinpoint areas for service enhancement. Connectivity, as defined by Singtel, is the server connection response time, measured in milliseconds...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-provides-an-explanation-of-mobile-performance/
